# Bier of Inquisition, Greater (WondArch)
## Overview
**Bier of Inquisition, Greater:** This works like the standard *[[Bier of Inquisition (WondArch)|bier of inquisition]]*, but the effect lasts for up to 15 minutes and the corpse can be asked up to seven questions.

*Caster Level:* 15th; Prerequisites: [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Speak with Dead (Spell)|speak with dead]]**; Market Price:* 22,500 gp.

**Source:** Stronghold Builders Guidebook (WotC), pg. 71
